channel.title: Gain access to pc
channel.description:
My dad recently got new computers at his job. So he brought his old one home and what do you know? It is password protected and his old pass won't work. I tryed to go to Administrator acc. And I went to safe mode,,, But there is still A password
It is running Windows Xp Pro and it is A dell optiplex gx240.. Please tell me soon and thankyou!

item.title: Gain access to pc
item.dc:creator: @megias megias
item.description:
@megias wrote:

Does anyone know of any programs that start at boot so I can run them without Loggin on… And I can’t log on the OS at ALL… Can I just like unplug the hard drive then plug it back in, And it will loose all memory or something? Let me know

Read full topic

item.title: Gain access to pc
item.dc:creator: @blah_bah7 blah bah7
item.description:
@blah_bah7 wrote:

Exception:

There are programs to crack passwords

how would you go about running the program if you cant use the computer?

Read full topic

item.title: Gain access to pc
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“megias, post:1, topic:151581”]My dad recently got new computers at his job. So he brought his old one home and what do you know? It is password protected and his old pass won’t work. I tryed to go to Administrator acc. And I went to safe mode, But there is still A password

It is running Windows Xp Pro and it is A dell optiplex gx240… Please tell me soon and thankyou![/quote]

Install kubuntu and zombify it into a webserver.

/on topic: If there’s a password on the admin in safe mode and you don’t have the original cd’s then you’re pretty much screwed in terms of recovering the original Windows installation, so the only thing you could do would be to put a new OS on there.

Read full topic
